00017 void LoggerFactoryInterface::reinitLoggers() {
00018 
00019         AutoMutex a(m_allLoggersMtx);
00020 
00021         LogLevel level;
00022         for (size_t i = 0; i < m_allLoggers.size(); i++) {
00023 
00024                 LoggerPtr logger = m_allLoggers[i];
00025                 LogCollectorPtr clctr = getCollector(logger->getClassName());
00026                 if (clctr) {
00027                         level = clctr->getLogLevel();
00028                 }else{
00029                         level = DEBUG;
00030                 }
00031 
00032                 logger->setCollector(clctr);
00033                 logger->setLogLevel(level);
00034 
00035         }
00036 
00037 }

00039 void LoggerFactoryInterface::setFactoryMap(std::map<std::string,
00040                 LogCollectorPtr>* m) {
00041         AutoMutex a(m_factoryMapMutex);
00042         if (m_factoryMap != NULL)
00043                 delete m_factoryMap;
00044         m_factoryMap = m;
00045 }
00046 
00047 bool LoggerFactoryInterface::hasFactoryMap(){
00048         AutoMutex a(m_factoryMapMutex);
00049         if (m_factoryMap != NULL)
00050                 return true;
00051         return false;
00052 }

00055 LoggerFactoryInterface::LoggerFactoryInterface() :
00056         m_connected(false), m_writeFileLine(false), m_level(DEBUG) {
00057         m_factoryMap = NULL;
00058 }

00060 int LoggerFactoryInterface::init(const std::string &addr,
00061                 const unsigned short port, const std::string &strLevel,
00062                 const bool isStdOut) {
00063 
00064         m_sockFd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0);
00065         m_procAddr.sin_family = PF_INET;
00066         m_procAddr.sin_port = htons(port);
00067         m_procAddr.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr(addr.c_str());
00068         m_stdout = isStdOut;
00069 
00070         if (!strLevel.compare("DEBUG")) {
00071                 m_level = DEBUG;
00072         } else if (!strLevel.compare("TRACE")) {
00073                 m_level = TRACE;
00074         } else if (!strLevel.compare("INFO")) {
00075                 m_level = INFO;
00076         } else if (!strLevel.compare("WARNING")) {
00077                 m_level = WARNING;
00078         } else if (!strLevel.compare("ERROR")) {
00079                 m_level = ERROR;
00080         } else {
00081                 std::cout << "can't determinate log level " << strLevel
00082                                 << ". Use default 'DEBUG'";
00083                 m_level = DEBUG;
00084         }
00085 
00086         if (isStdOut) {
00087                 m_defaultCollector = new LogCollector();
00088                 m_defaultCollector->setStdOut();
00089                 m_defaultCollector->start();
00090         }
00091         return 0;
00092 }
00093 
00094 LogCollectorPtr LoggerFactoryInterface::getCollector(
00095                 const std::string &className) {
00096 
00097         if (!m_factoryMap) {
00098                 return m_defaultCollector;
00099         }
00100 
00101         LogCollectorPtr collector;
00102         AutoMutex a(m_factoryMapMutex);
00103         std::map<std::string, LogCollectorPtr>::iterator it = m_factoryMap->find(
00104                         className);
00105         if (it != m_factoryMap->end()) {
00106                 collector = it->second;
00107         } else {
00108                 collector = m_defaultCollector;
00109         }
00110 
00111         return collector;
00112 }
00113 
00114 int LoggerFactoryInterface::init(const XmlConfigPtr cfg) {
00115 
00116         ConfigList cfgList = cfg->getConfigs(std::string("logfile"));
00117         std::vector<LogCollectorPtr> collectors;
00118 
00119         for (size_t i = 0; i < cfgList.size(); i++) {
00120                 LogCollectorPtr collector = new LogCollector();
00121                 if (!collector->init(cfgList[i])) {
00122                         collectors.push_back(collector);
00123                         collector->start();
00124                 } else {
00125                         return -1;
00126                 }
00127         }
00128 
00129         std::map<std::string, LogCollectorPtr>* newMap = createFactoryMap(
00130                         collectors);
00131 
00132         bool needReinitLogger = hasFactoryMap();
00133         setFactoryMap(newMap);
00134 
00135         if(needReinitLogger){
00136                 reinitLoggers();
00137         }
00138 
00139         return 0;
00140 }
00141 
00142 std::map<std::string, LogCollectorPtr> *LoggerFactoryInterface::createFactoryMap(
00143                 const std::vector<LogCollectorPtr> &v) {
00144 
00145         std::map<std::string, LogCollectorPtr> *map = new std::map<std::string,
00146                         LogCollectorPtr>;
00147 
00148         for (size_t i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) {
00149                 LogCollectorPtr clctr = v[i];
00150                 std::vector<std::string> &classes = clctr->getClassNames();
00151                 for (size_t j = 0; j < classes.size(); j++) {
00152                         (*map)[classes[j]] = clctr;
00153                 }
00154 
00155                 if (clctr->isDefault()) {
00156                         m_defaultCollector = clctr;
00157                 }
00158         }
00159 
00160         return map;
00161 }
00162 
00163 LoggerPtr LoggerFactoryInterface::createLogger(const std::string &className) {
00164 
00165         LogLevel level = INFO;
00166 
00167         LogCollectorPtr clctr = getCollector(className);
00168         if (clctr) {
00169                 level = clctr->getLogLevel();
00170         }
00171         LoggerPtr logger = new Logger(className, level);
00172         logger->setCollector(clctr);
00173 
00174         AutoMutex a(m_allLoggersMtx);
00175         m_allLoggers.push_back(logger);
00176 
00177         return logger;
00178 }
